column5: And so begins the exodus of OFC'er's to the West Arm (although I'm sure there are a few already up there inflicting sore mouths). I'm leaving late tonight, arriving early Thursday morning after a pit stop in Parry Sound. Been a couple of years since I could make this g2g, have to say I have been looking forward to this for some time.
It'll be great to see you again Roger, I'll be there sometime tomorrow (morning) as well.
See you there in the morning
All youz guyz drive safe. Won't be up there until noon'ish Friday, so save some for me...  J...
For those of you I don't know, I'll be the guy holding the Crayola Cup Saturday afternoon   (yes, I do enjoy a bit of fishing trash talk)
So you are the one that pre-fishes and has all of the stringers tied off in the back bays...........
Well it's always nice when a gentleman holds something heavy up for a woman  See you there Rog, can't wait myself.  Should be there noonish Friday too!!  Drive safe.  Joey
looking forward to seeing everyone, drive safe and I'll be there in time for breakfast Friday morning, Joey, it will be good to help you set the tent up in the day light  Maureen
How nice of you to get it for us, We will arrive Thursday afternoon if you want to carry our luggage too..

I'll be there at the same time as Joey......by pure happenstance.  Everyone, please drive safely...I'll be leaving here Thursday after my work...prolly be having a snooze in Mattawa.  Joey, you need anything from here?
Safe trip and have a great time.  That shouldn;t be too difficult.
Do they still have those Morels dear?  Since you're asking!!
I'll see what I can do, my Honey.
Safe drive, look forward to meeting you  Safe driving to everyone else as well....cannot wait!!!
hahaha that won't be necessary against this motley crew. I'll probably stick around at the docks and have some lunch for the first hour of the tourney just to give everyone a fair chance

Have fun, everyone. I sure wish I could join y'all.  And John, thanks for the offer but I can't make it happen this weekend. I'll just have to stay home and settle for my little river run bass on Saturday and Sunday.  JF
No problem John, you are welcome anytime.
Lots of pictures guys! Have a good trip and we will look forward to your reports. Jim
